# VEHICLE::SET_ALLOW_RAMMING_SOOP_OR_RAMP

## Summary
Sets whether the special ramming scoop or ramp car code is applied to collisions with this vehicle

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** allowed
